title: GLOBALink | Xinjiang, My home: Kanas B&B owner hopes to bring taste of Kazak culture to tourists
content:
KANAS, April 30 (Xinhua) -- Ospan Malik was born and raised in Kanas in Altay Prefecture in northwest China's Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
He owns more than 30 bed-and-breakfast lodges in Kanas, a place known for its winter scenery.
To be a Kazak, he hopes to show tourists the traditional way of living of Kazak people through his lodges.
He also hopes to lead more local herders to open bed-and-breakfast lodges so as to live a prosperous life together.
Produced by Xinhua Global Service
